ISSUE.TITLE: No files found matching exist in an asset /lib_npm/jquery/jquery.min.js
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.7 Steps to reproduce the problem: i am trying to run nopcommerce 4.7 using iis, the public site is working fine but the admin it gives an error : No files --------------------------------------- after checking the error , i found that this error happened because of this tag asp-location="None" <script asp-location="None" src="~/lib_npm/jquery/jquery.min.js"></script> which is located in Presentation\Nop.Web\Areas\Admin\Views\Shared\_AdminScripts.cshtml after removing asp-location="None" it works fine!!!! Note : in My local iis my url is like: http://localhost/eshopweb/Admin please can you check <3

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #7206 Fixed auto adding required products when the RequireOtherProducts is disabled

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #7201 Fixed an issue with the location of pinned scripts when nopCommerce is hosted in a virtual directory
